item.title: See you at CIVITAS '23!
item.description: CIVITAS Heading to the CIVITAS 2023 Annual Conference this year? We are honored to be involved in one of the most anticipated events of the year â€“ bringing together the Civitas Networks for Health national network to collaborate and transform the health of our communities. item.title: See you at HIMSS '23!
item.description: Interoperability First Heading to HIMSS (Healthcare Information and Management Systems Society) this year? MayJuun is partnering with Open City Labs to demonstrate the entire closed-loop referral process, from person identification and screening assessment to creating and managing referrals. We have also partnered with the Interoperability Institute to connect our questionnaire assessments application (Cuestionario) to their MELD open-source sandbox. Join Our Mailing List We'd love to connect. First Name Last Name Organization Title Email Phone Comments Submit
